text: pachi tame jyare hajjana sidranto pura kari lo to allahana namanum smarana karo jevi rite tame potana purvajona namanum smarana karata raho cho parantu tenathi pana vadhare, ketalaka te loko pana che je kahe che he amara palanahara! Amane duniyamam bhala'i apa, ava loko mate akherata (paraloka) manko'i bhaga nathi
